text: U&Yesterday;, previously known as Yesterday, is a British free-to-air history- oriented television channel broadcasting in the United Kingdom and Ireland. It was originally launched on 30 October 2002 as UK History. It was later relaunched as Yesterday on 2 March 2009, and rebranded on 16 July 2024 as U&Yesterday.; It is available on satellite through Sky, Freesat and through the digital terrestrial provider Freeview. == Other websites == * Category:2002 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:British television channels
title: U&Yesterday
